project.nonGoals: What does this project NOT do? (what is out of scope)

tech.language: What is the main language of the project?
preferences.strictMode: Do you prefer strict mode in TypeScript?

ai.preferredModelImplementation: Which AI model do you prefer for Code Implementation?

libraries.allowed: Additional allowed libraries (comma-separated, or leave blank):

architecture.style: Architectural style of the project (e.g.: Monolith, Microservices, Serverless):
architecture.decisions: Main architectural decisions (comma-separated, or leave blank):
architecture.patterns: Design patterns used (comma-separated, or leave blank):
security.rules: Specific security rules (comma-separated, or leave blank):
testing.strategy: Testing strategy (or leave blank to use default):
testing.coverage: Minimum expected test coverage (e.g.: 80%, or leave blank):
testing.tools: Testing tools used (comma-separated, or leave blank):
deployment.method: Deployment method (e.g.: Docker, Vercel, AWS, or leave blank):
deployment.cicd: CI/CD tool (e.g.: GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, or leave blank):
deployment.environments: Available environments (e.g.: dev, staging, prod, or leave blank):
documentation.api: API documentation tool (e.g.: Swagger, or leave blank):
